alt: Bengali Contemporary Classic Fiction Book | SUBARNOLATA | Ashapoorna Devi [Hardcover] Ashapoorna Devi [Hardcover] Ashapoorna Devi

reviews.text: The book delivered was in very good condition. So I liked the purchase.

I had already owned 'Prothom Protishruti' , the predecessor of this book ; however , couldn't find 'Subarnalata' in my local book store . Many thanks to Amazon for delivering this literary masterpiece to my doorstep
